sentences.sentence: I refused to wear headphones because they can perforate your eardrums.
sentences.translation: 我不愿戴耳机，因为它可能会使鼓膜穿孔。

sentences.sentence: So musical instruments evolved in ways that optimize their acoustical properties, how the instrument vibrates and sends those vibration through the air to our eardrums.
sentences.translation: 因此，乐器的进化优化了它们的声学特性，且优化了乐器振动的方式，并将这些振动通过空气传到我们的耳膜。

sentences.sentence: You had better open your mouth to relieve the pressure on your eardrums.
sentences.translation: 你最好张开嘴以减轻耳朵鼓膜所受的压力。
